name: Mecha Devil
description:
Warning: Has blood effects and a scary monster.

Note: The webgl version works fine on Chrome but on Edge doesn't render the damage on the boss. 

Johnny and Lizz are space pirates trying to steal an advanced mech from a secret base. Fight against a large and terrifying opponent.

Created for Bullet Hell Jam 2022.

Cover image by Slobobo

Unfortunately I ran a little late on this one, so I plan to add a small escape sequence after the game jam has been scored.

Premade Assets used:

- TopDown Engine

- FEEL

- BulletFury

- DialogueSystem
